LanguageData.CFSettings_DebugTooltip: Enable debug logging, especially on load. You generally don't need to enable this unless asked to.
LanguageData.CFSettings_PPMTooltip: Whether to print all the Harmony patches which are successfully applied.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyAtOwnRisk: Disabling any patches may result in unpredictable behavior and features breaking. Only disable them if you know what you're doing!
LanguageData.CFSettings_DebugModeRequired: If debug mode is disabled, all patches will be applied.
LanguageData.CFSettings_RestartToApply: You must restart the game for patch settings to apply.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyCFSTooltip: Whether to apply the CompFromStuff patch, which allows materials to add additional properties to things made therefrom.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyOTHTooltip: Whether to apply the Orbital Trade Hook patch, which allows modders to create custom trade beacons.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyDRFTooltip: Whether to apply the Deconstruct Return Fix patch, which fixes a vanilla bug which prevents buildings from returning all their items when deconstructed.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyCMFTooltip: Whether to apply the patches for the Carry Mass Framework, which allows mod authors to modify the way carry mass works in game.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyNFPTooltip: Whether to apply the Negative Fertility Patch, which allows specific plants to grow faster in less fertile soil.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyFRFTooltip: Whether to apply the Facility Requires Fuel patch, which allows modders to create facilities which require fuel to operate.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyCBRTooltip: Whether to apply the Calculate Bleed Rate patch, which allows modders to apply bleed rate modifiers on pawns using a stat.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyHRPTooltip: Whether to apply the Healing Rate Patch, which allows modders to apply healing rate modifiers on pawns using a stat.
LanguageData.CF_Roofed_NeedsRoof: {0} needs to be placed under a roof
LanguageData.CF_Chandelier_TooTall: {0} is too tall to place a {1} here
LanguageData.CF_MustBePlacedOnWall: {0} must be placed on a wall
